title: Edelweiss Housing Finance ties up with SBI for co-lending in priority sector home loans - Economic Times
content:
1. Edelweiss Housing Finance ties up with SBI for co-lending in priority sector home loans  Economic Times
  2. SBI ties-up with 5 housing finance companies to further affordable loans to unserved  Moneycontrol
  3. SBI signs pact with Housing Finance Companies for co-lending of home loans  Indiainfoline
  4. SBI shares rise post tie-up with 5 housing finance firms for affordable home loans  CNBCTV18
  5. IIFL Home Finance ties up with SBI for affordable housing loanss  Business Standard
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: For EHFL, co-lending represents an alternate model of disbursals that is asset-light and creates a sound revenue model for sustainable business, whereas for SBI - which brings capital flows at lower costs - the partnership provides wider customer reach.
